subject: physics
hook: You're FALLING right now... but WHY don't you feel it?
key_points: Every object attracts every other object - even YOU and your phone!
F = Gm₁m₂/r² - The formula that explains the universe
G is incredibly tiny: 6.67 × 10⁻¹¹ - that's why you don't stick to walls
Earth's mass is HUGE - that's why gravity feels strong
Moon's gravity = 1/6 Earth's - you could dunk like an NBA star!
core_analogy: Gravity is like invisible strings connecting EVERYTHING in the universe - the heavier you are, the more strings pull you
mind_blow: You're gravitationally attracting your crush right now... but the force is 0.0000000001 Newtons!
exam_relevance: JEE asks: Calculate gravitational force between Earth and Moon. NEET asks: Why astronauts feel weightless.
